attributes.action: Continue to allow veterinary surgeons to dock the tails of 'traditionally docked breeds' of dog.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Continue to allow veterinary surgeons to dock the tails of 'traditionally docked breeds' of dog.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Continue to allow veterinary surgeons to dock the tails of 'traditionally docked breeds' of dog."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14087.asp

Prime Minister's Office
